original: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: de b'i dz'a li mah'a m'a y'a tantra n'a ma /
analyzed: de b'i dz'a li mah'a m'a y'a tantra n'a ma /
translated: Devījālamahāmāyātantra-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lha mo sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
analyzed: lha mo sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
translated: The Tantra Called the Great Magical Web of the Goddess

original: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Great Secret!

original: 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa nyid du gyur pa'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor chen po @2a *//
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa nyid du gyur pa'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor chen po @2a *//
translated: Thus, when this was spoken, the Blessed One, the Thus-Gone One, the Great Yoga Equal to Space,🔽the Great Yoginī, the Great Devotee, the Protector,

original: dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / shin tu mos pa chen mo dang / mos pa dang bcas pa srung bar byed pa /🔽rab tu rnam par srung bar byed pa /
analyzed: dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / shin tu mos pa chen mo dang / mos pa dang bcas pa srung bar byed pa / rab tu rnam par srung bar byed pa /
translated: the Great Guardian,

original: nye ba mo dang bcas pa /
analyzed: nye ba mo dang bcas pa /
translated: the One with the Close One,

original: nye bar zhi ba chen po dang / zhi bar mdzad pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba chen po dang / zhi bar mdzad pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa /
translated: the Great Pacifier, the Great Peacemaker, the Beautiful One, the One with Color,

original: shes pa dang skyabs su ldan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa dang skyabs su ldan pa ni /
translated: the One with Knowledge and Refuge,

original: 'di lta ste; gtso bo rnal 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje nyid du 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po btang snyoms zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po dbang du mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste; gtso bo rnal 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje nyid du 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po btang snyoms zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po dbang du mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /
translated: The four are the so-called principal yoga cakra, the so-called great yoga vajra gathering, the so-called great yoga equanimity, and the so-called great yoga subjugation.

original: @2b rnal 'byor shin tu rnam par rgya gram gyi tshul 'dzin pa dang bcas pa ni /
analyzed: @2b rnal 'byor shin tu rnam par rgya gram gyi tshul 'dzin pa dang bcas pa ni /
translated: The great yoga is the method of holding the vajra cross.

original: cir yang ston pa'i gzugs kyis kha dog bzhi dang ldan te 'dug pa'i cha lugs kyis cod pan lnga dang ldan te /
analyzed: cir yang ston pa'i gzugs kyis kha dog bzhi dang ldan te 'dug pa'i cha lugs kyis cod pan lnga dang ldan te /
translated: The form that is shown as anything has four colors and is endowed with five crowns.

original: ma bsgribs mi sgrib bsgribs pa mi 'gog bsgrib tu med pa'i dbyings nas yang dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po na mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rjes sku ma bkag pas mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs so //
analyzed: ma bsgribs mi sgrib bsgribs pa mi 'gog bsgrib tu med pa'i dbyings nas yang dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po na mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rjes sku ma bkag pas mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs so //
translated: In the unobscured, unobstructed, unobstructed, and unobscured dhātu, the great perfect celestial mansion is the method of great uniformity.

original: de yang 'di ltar so sor gsal bar mnyam pa chen po dang 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam pa chen pos yo byad chen po ni /🔽kun gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ni brten pas phyin ci ma log pa dang / gnyis su du ma med pa ni /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar so sor gsal bar mnyam pa chen po dang 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam pa chen pos yo byad chen po ni / kun gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ni brten pas phyin ci ma log pa dang / gnyis su du ma med pa ni /
translated: The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.

original: gzungs rnal 'byor ma chen mo ste /🔽byang chub chen mo nam mkha' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo nam mkha' @3a *//
analyzed: gzungs rnal 'byor ma chen mo ste / byang chub chen mo nam mkha' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo nam mkha' @3a *//
translated: The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.

original: 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo sa srung ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rlan par byed pa chen mo dang / byang chub chen mo rnam par khengs pa spangs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo las grub par mdzad ma zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo sa srung ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rlan par byed pa chen mo dang / byang chub chen mo rnam par khengs pa spangs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo las grub par mdzad ma zhes bya ba dang /
translated: The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.🔽The great means are the great sameness of the individual clear appearances and the great sameness of the retinue.

original: byang chub chen mo rdo rje rab tu chags pa chen mo 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / rab tu ma chags pa gsod ces bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo gsung gi 'khor lo ma zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub chen mo rdo rje rab tu chags pa chen mo 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / rab tu ma chags pa gsod ces bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo gsung gi 'khor lo ma zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The great enlightenment, the great vajra, the great passion holder, the great non-passion killer, the great enlightenment, the great delusion remover, and the great enlightenment, the speech wheel lady.

original: de dag kyang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: shin tu autpal lta bu'i mdog dang / shag kra dang / bee d'urya dang / padma r'a ga dang / aasma garbha la sogs pa rdzas kyi bsngags pas 'phags par 'tsher ba ma smin pa med par bzhugs pa ni /
analyzed: shin tu autpal lta bu'i mdog dang / shag kra dang / bee d'urya dang / padma r'a ga dang / aasma garbha la sogs pa rdzas kyi bsngags pas 'phags par 'tsher ba ma smin pa med par bzhugs pa ni /
translated: The color of a blue lotus, shakra, vaidurya, padmaraga, asmagarbha, and so forth, who are radiant with the praise of substances, and who are not unripened.

original: rnal 'byor ma kun tu bzang @3b po 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun tu bzang @3b po 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
translated: They are the yoginis, Samantabhadri and her retinue.

original: de yang gus pa chen po gsang ba dang / gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni /
analyzed: de yang gus pa chen po gsang ba dang / gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni /
translated: Moreover, the great respect of the secret, the great respect of the various smells, and the great respect of the powerful

original: gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba 'dzin byed ma dang / rnam par dri'i gnas su gyur ba dang / rnam par sgra byed pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o //🔽de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i dbang po dang / nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang / bsung byed chen po'i dbang po dang / btang ba chen po'i dbang po dang / shin tu gtong bar mdzad pa dang / shin tu rtog par mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba 'dzin byed ma dang / rnam par dri'i gnas su gyur ba dang / rnam par sgra byed pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o // de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i dbang po dang / nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang / bsung byed chen po'i dbang po dang / btang ba chen po'i dbang po dang / shin tu gtong bar mdzad pa dang / shin tu rtog par mdzad pa dang /
translated: The secret organ, the organ of clarity, the organ of holding, the organ of form that makes sound.

original: shin tu 'dzin dbang chen po dang / shin tu grub par mdzad pa dang / cha lugs mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu 'dzin dbang chen po dang / shin tu grub par mdzad pa dang / cha lugs mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The organ that sees reality, the organ that hears, the organ of great smell, the organ of great taste, the organ of great touch, the organ of great thought, the organ of great action, the organ of great non-action, the organ of great non-thought, the organ of great non-doing, the organ of great non-holding, the organ of great non-accomplishment, the queen who does not abandon her attire.

original: yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang / med pa sel bar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'du shes rgyal ba yin par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'gog pa rnam par 'joms pa chen mo dang / mngon spyod kyi las kyis gnyis su med par 'khril nas chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhugs so //
analyzed: yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang / med pa sel bar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'du shes rgyal ba yin par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'gog pa rnam par 'joms pa chen mo dang / mngon spyod kyi las kyis gnyis su med par 'khril nas chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhugs so //
translated: The one who makes the concept of existence, the one who clears away nonexistence, the one who makes the victor of discrimination, the one who conquers the great cessation, and the one who is embraced nondually by the activity of wrathful action abides in the celestial mansion of the great equality of the dharmadhātu.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzhal yas su dgyes nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi tshogs chen mo mu khyud kun dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzhal yas su dgyes nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi tshogs chen mo mu khyud kun dang ldan pa /
translated: Then, the bhagavān was pleased in the celestial mansion of the great yoga of the great secret. The great assembly of wisdom, the dhātu of nonarising,

original: zla rgyas lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa /
analyzed: zla rgyas lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa /
translated: is like a full moon, pervading the maṇḍala without periphery or center.

original: rin po che kun dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rin po che kun dang ldan pa /
translated: It is endowed with all jewels.

original: gra dang ngos dang kha dog dang @4a *//
analyzed: gra dang ngos dang kha dog dang @4a *//
translated: The tiers, sides, colors,

original: dbyibs rgya khyon dpag tu med par gyur pa /
analyzed: dbyibs rgya khyon dpag tu med par gyur pa /
translated: and shape and size are immeasurable.

original: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cha lugs kyis rnam par mdzes pa /
analyzed: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cha lugs kyis rnam par mdzes pa /
translated: It is beautified by the attire of inconceivable pristine consciousness.

original: yid bzhin chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par spras pa /
analyzed: yid bzhin chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par spras pa /
translated: It is adorned with the ornament of the great wish-fulfilling gem.

original: sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'jin pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'jin pa //
translated: It is the lineage of the victors, distinguished by its variety.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa /
translated: It has the four doors of the great magical display.

original: theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa chen po 'bab gzhol dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin tu gsang ba chen mo dang bcas pa /
analyzed: theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa chen po 'bab gzhol dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin tu gsang ba chen mo dang bcas pa /
translated: It is the descent of the great vehicle for the yogis of the outer vehicle, with the supreme great virtue and sin, and the very great secret.🔽In the center of the great lotus, it is beautified by the distinctions of the four-colored tongue.

original: padma chen po'i dbus na lce kha dog bzhi'i bye brag gis mdzes par gyur pa; phyogs bzhi bre ba rim pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: padma chen po'i dbus na lce kha dog bzhi'i bye brag gis mdzes par gyur pa; phyogs bzhi bre ba rim pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the great secret maṇḍala with the attire of the three stages of the four directions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu sel ba ste le'u dang po'o ////
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu sel ba ste le'u dang po'o ////
translated: This is the first chapter on the maṇḍala of all tathāgatas, the supreme remover of obscurations.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po gdung ba mchog tu sel bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po la dbang sgyur bar dgyes te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po gdung ba mchog tu sel bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po la dbang sgyur bar dgyes te /
translated: Then the Bhagavat entered the samadhi called Great Enjoyment, the Supreme Dispelling of Torment, and with a great smile, he rejoiced in his mastery of great passion.

original: gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la padma dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par mdzad de /
analyzed: gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la padma dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par mdzad de /
translated: In the space of the great secret, he opened the lotus with the color of power.

original: aom su ra tva su khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur ro //
analyzed: aom su ra tva su khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur ro //
translated: By his utterance of Om surata sukhe, the inconceivable vajra family, together with the queens, came into being.

original: de nas rab tu 'di brjod par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas rab tu 'di brjod par mdzad do //
translated: Then he uttered this:

original: bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'tsher /
analyzed: bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'tsher /
translated: The fourth is white and shining.

original: @4b btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis //
analyzed: @4b btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis //
translated: By the emanation and withdrawal of all equanimities,🔽The third is clearly manifest,

original: gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de dag las //
analyzed: gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de dag las //
translated: And from those supreme hosts of mudras,

original: rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes //
analyzed: rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes //
translated: The queens rejoice together.🔽The mudras hold vajras and bells,

original: phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin; ;bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs kyis //
analyzed: phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin; ;bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs kyis //
translated: And with the attire of the thirteenth,

original: che chung med par gsal bar bsgom //
analyzed: che chung med par gsal bar bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the clear manifestation without size.

original: dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan //
analyzed: dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan //
translated: The head is endowed with the second syllable.

original: gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu //
translated: At the time of clarity,🔽From the jewel of the five crowns,

original: cod pan lnga yi rin chen las; ;rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal pa yin //
analyzed: cod pan lnga yi rin chen las; ;rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal pa yin //
translated: The family of ornaments is clear.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra called the Sublime Ornament, the supreme secret of all tathagatas.

original: gsum pa mthing 'bar yi ge che //
analyzed: gsum pa mthing 'bar yi ge che //
translated: The third is the blazing blue great syllable.

original: rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las //
analyzed: rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las //
translated: From the emanating and gathering of the jewel of the family,

original: phyag rgyar gsal bas skur gsal ba //
analyzed: phyag rgyar gsal bas skur gsal ba //
translated: The mudra is clear, and the body is clear.

original: rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes //
analyzed: rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes //
translated: The king and queen rejoice together.

original: sgrib pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms //
translated: Abandoning all obscurations, without misdeeds, the vow

original: gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las //
analyzed: gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las //
translated: From the second syllable,

original: cod pan lnga ldan yi ger gsal //
analyzed: cod pan lnga ldan yi ger gsal //
translated: The crown is endowed with the five syllables.

original: thams cad blo sbyangs yid bzhin gter //
analyzed: thams cad blo sbyangs yid bzhin gter //
translated: All are refined by the mind, a wish-fulfilling treasure.

original: mnyam pa 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa //
analyzed: mnyam pa 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa //
translated: Holding the style of embracing equality,

original: rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal //
analyzed: rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal //
translated: The mudra of the jewel family is clear.

original: las thams cad kyi mchog rgyal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: las thams cad kyi mchog rgyal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the queen's play, supreme among all activities.

original: padma r'a ga 'dra ba'i mdog /
analyzed: padma r'a ga 'dra ba'i mdog /
translated: The color is like a ruby,

original: chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa //
analyzed: chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the moon crescent of the dharmakaya.

original: gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa ni //
analyzed: gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa ni //
translated: The beautiful colors of clarity

original: thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad //
analyzed: thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad //
translated: are all brought under control without exception.

original: sbyar dang bskyed dang bsdu ba yis //
analyzed: sbyar dang bskyed dang bsdu ba yis //
translated: Through union, creation, and dissolution,

original: phyag rgyar gsal bas dbang gi sku //
analyzed: phyag rgyar gsal bas dbang gi sku //
translated: the mudrā manifests as the empowerment body.

original: btsun mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes //
analyzed: btsun mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes //
translated: The queen is delighted,

original: gnyis su med par 'khril ba yis //
analyzed: gnyis su med par 'khril ba yis //
translated: and through embracing without duality,

original: dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa ldan //
analyzed: dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa ldan //
translated: the second syllable is added to the head.

original: @5a *// rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las //
analyzed: @5a *// rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las //
translated: From the emanation and dissolution of the jewel family,

original: cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste //
analyzed: cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste //
translated: the crown is the color of the five families.

original: ji bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis //🔽phyag rgya bzhugs tshul padma'i tshul //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis // phyag rgya bzhugs tshul padma'i tshul //
translated: Through the samādhi of just what it is,🔽the mudrā is the lotus posture.

original: mnyam par bsam pas dkyil 'khor yin //
analyzed: mnyam par bsam pas dkyil 'khor yin //
translated: The maṇḍala is contemplated as equipoise.

original: mi 'byed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: mi 'byed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: Through the samādhi of nondifferentiation,

original: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog /
translated: the supreme gathering of all perfect maṇḍalas

original: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal //
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal //
translated: manifests as the mudrā of the lotus family.

original: mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin; ;gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom //
analyzed: mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin; ;gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom //
translated: Like a lamp that dispels darkness, meditate without clarity, purity, or doubt.

original: chu skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan //
analyzed: chu skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan //
translated: The light of the smiling lotus

original: steg dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis //
analyzed: steg dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis //
translated: is the play of the dance of union.

original: dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod par bsham //🔽'di ltar gsal bas dbang yang rdzogs //
analyzed: dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod par bsham // 'di ltar gsal bas dbang yang rdzogs //

translated: With a face that is full of radiance,

original: @7b mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod //
analyzed: @7b mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod //
translated: She makes offerings with a dance of pleasure.

original: gru tshad bzhi yi rim pa la //
analyzed: gru tshad bzhi yi rim pa la //
translated: On the four-sided platform,

original: thos byed gsal byed gsung ba che //
analyzed: thos byed gsal byed gsung ba che //
translated: The one who clarifies hearing is Mahāvāca.

original: dri dang ldan pa la sogs pas //
analyzed: dri dang ldan pa la sogs pas //
translated: Endowed with smell and so on,

original: btsun mo dag dang thabs cig tu //
analyzed: btsun mo dag dang thabs cig tu //
translated: together with the queens,

original: gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
translated: he abides in the manner of nonduality.

original: bar 'khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni //
analyzed: bar 'khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni //
translated: Abiding in the four intermediate courtyards

original: thos byed dbang dang nyan byed dbang //
analyzed: thos byed dbang dang nyan byed dbang //
translated: are the one with the power of hearing, the one with the power of listening,

original: dri mchog dbang du lta byed dbang //
analyzed: dri mchog dbang du lta byed dbang //
translated: the one with the power of supreme smell, and the one with the power of sight.

original: dus ni bzhi rnams lha mo bzhi //
analyzed: dus ni bzhi rnams lha mo bzhi //
translated: The four goddesses are the four times.

original: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas //🔽zhe sdang 'joms byed la sogs pas //
analyzed: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas // zhe sdang 'joms byed la sogs pas //
translated: They abide together with the assembly of queens.

original: sgo rnams kun du gnas pa ni //
analyzed: sgo rnams kun du gnas pa ni //
translated: Abiding at all the gates, such as the one who conquers anger,

original: snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas //
analyzed: snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas //
translated: he abides together with the mother of compassion.

original: nyi ma zla ba padma mchog /
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba padma mchog /
translated: The supreme sun, moon, and lotus,

original: rin chen dung dang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: rin chen dung dang bcas pa ste //
translated: together with the jewel and conch,

original: tshangs pa brgya byin gnyis gnyis kyis //
analyzed: tshangs pa brgya byin gnyis gnyis kyis //
translated: are the two pairs of Brahmā and Indra.

original: btegs pa'i khri la rab tu bzhugs //
analyzed: btegs pa'i khri la rab tu bzhugs //
translated: He is seated upon a throne held up by two pairs.

original: rdzogs pa chen por kun kyang gnas //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen por kun kyang gnas //
translated: All are present in the Great Perfection.

original: sems dpa' chen po'i bzhugs tshul du; ;kun kyang rab tu gnas par bstan //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po'i bzhugs tshul du; ;kun kyang rab tu gnas par bstan //
translated: All are taught to abide in the manner of the great being.

original: zhal ni kun du sa le ba //
analyzed: zhal ni kun du sa le ba //
translated: The face is completely clear.

original: thugs ni kun tu lhan ne ba //
analyzed: thugs ni kun tu lhan ne ba //
translated: The mind is completely radiant.

original: sku ni kun la khyab par gsal //🔽ae ma mi skye mi 'gag mchog /
analyzed: sku ni kun la khyab par gsal // ae ma mi skye mi 'gag mchog /
translated: The body is clear, pervading everything.🔽Amazing! Supreme, unborn, unceasing!

original: ae ma mi sel mi len mchog /
analyzed: ae ma mi sel mi len mchog /
translated: Amazing! Supreme, not removing, not taking!

original: ae ma tsham ngam drag shul spyod //
analyzed: ae ma tsham ngam drag shul spyod //
translated: Amazing! Performing violent, wrathful conduct!

original: ae ma gshegs pa'i stobs dang bcas //
analyzed: ae ma gshegs pa'i stobs dang bcas //
translated: Amazing! Endowed with the power of going!

original: ae ma mtshan ma sel bar ston //🔽ae ma gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrog /
analyzed: ae ma mtshan ma sel bar ston // ae ma gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrog /
translated: Amazing! Revealing the removal of signs!🔽Amazing! Roaring like an ocean of scriptures!

original: ae ma byol song spro ba bskyed //
analyzed: ae ma byol song spro ba bskyed //
translated: Amazing! Inspiring the delight of animals!

original: ae ma sprul pa bsam yas mchog /
analyzed: ae ma sprul pa bsam yas mchog /
translated: Amazing! Supreme, inconceivable emanations!

original: ae ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad //
analyzed: ae ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad //
translated: Amazing! Bringing about nirvana!

original: ae ma gsang ba nges don mdzad //
analyzed: ae ma gsang ba nges don mdzad //
translated: Amazing! Performing the secret, definitive meaning!

original: ae ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor //
analyzed: ae ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor //
translated: Amazing! Conjoining with the dhāraṇīs!

original: ae ma ci yang mi mdzad @8a *//
analyzed: ae ma ci yang mi mdzad @8a *//
translated: Amazing! Supreme, doing nothing at all!

original: mchog / ngo mtshar sprin las 'di dag gis //
analyzed: mchog / ngo mtshar sprin las 'di dag gis //
translated: By these from the cloud of marvels,

original: sa yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur //
translated: The stages of the earth will be mastered.

original: zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pa la gleng ste mnyes par gyur to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pa la gleng ste mnyes par gyur to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This is the second chapter, the chapter on the wheel of Dharma of the bliss of yoga, the secret of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dris pa chen po dgongs pa dang / kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor ma zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dris pa chen po dgongs pa dang / kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor ma zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas /
translated: Then the Blessed One, delighted to enter into the yoga of Samantabhadrī, the great bliss, with great familiarity, and the yoga of Samantabhadrī, with a smiling face,

original: ae ma sems dpa'i thig le che //
analyzed: ae ma sems dpa'i thig le che //
translated: said, Ema! The great bindu of mind

original: bag chags kun gyi gnyen por gsungs //🔽'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med //
analyzed: bag chags kun gyi gnyen por gsungs // 'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med //
translated: is said to be the antidote to all traces.

original: ces brjod do //
analyzed: ces brjod do //
translated: There is no Dharma to be entered from this.

original: de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril bar gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril bar gyur te /
translated: Then, the great secret and the nondual embrace took place.

original: g-yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa mang pos mnyes pa dang / padma sbas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so //
analyzed: g-yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa mang pos mnyes pa dang / padma sbas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so //
translated: having increased the arising of Padma-guhya and so forth, is very pleased and sings this song:

original: ae ma bde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can //
analyzed: ae ma bde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can //
translated: Ema! The one born from supreme bliss, Vajrapāṇi,

original: chos kun dngos po med par gsal ba la //
analyzed: chos kun dngos po med par gsal ba la //
translated: in the clarity of all phenomena as unreal,

original: 'byung gnas chen pos ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen pa ae ma ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: 'byung gnas chen pos ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen pa ae ma ngo mtshar che //
translated: the great source, knows the arising of wonder. Ema! How marvelous!

original: rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'i //
analyzed: rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'i //
translated: Since the cause itself is empty, the result is not sought.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyal bas yong mi rnyed //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyal bas yong mi rnyed //
translated: The Victorious One does not find even cause and result.

original: stong pa nyid la dga' ba'i chags pa'i cho 'phrul ba //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la dga' ba'i chags pa'i cho 'phrul ba //
translated: The magical display of attachment to emptiness

original: de phyir skye 'gag med @8b ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod //
analyzed: de phyir skye 'gag med @8b ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod //
translated: is therefore called 'without arising or cessation' by the victors.

original: chos kun dbyer med ma rnying pa nyid las //
analyzed: chos kun dbyer med ma rnying pa nyid las //
translated: From the indivisibility of all phenomena,

original: kun gyi dga' ba 'byung ba rgyal ba kun bas shin tu 'phags //
analyzed: kun gyi dga' ba 'byung ba rgyal ba kun bas shin tu 'phags //
translated: the source of everyone's joy, is superior to all victors.

original: zhes brjod pas gsang ba'i mkha' la kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug par mdzad de shin du rngam pa'i glu 'di blangs so //
analyzed: zhes brjod pas gsang ba'i mkha' la kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug par mdzad de shin du rngam pa'i glu 'di blangs so //
translated: Thus speaking, he caused the yogin Samantabhadra to enter the secret space, and he sang this very wrathful song:

original: sgyu ma kun las 'phags pas dbyer med rnam par 'phrul byed pa //
analyzed: sgyu ma kun las 'phags pas dbyer med rnam par 'phrul byed pa //
translated: Emanating from the indivisible, exalted above all illusions,

original: kun tu bzang pe rnal 'byor de ni bder gshegs yum chen kun gyi gsos //
analyzed: kun tu bzang pe rnal 'byor de ni bder gshegs yum chen kun gyi gsos //
translated: The yogin Samantabhadra is the medicine for all the great mothers of the Sugatas.

original: sdug bsngal kun sbyong bder gshegs yum la 'jug pa thugs dam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun sbyong bder gshegs yum la 'jug pa thugs dam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: The Sugata's mother who purifies all suffering, the commitment is to enter her, so the Victorious One has said.

original: aom h'um mi 'gog ci yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnyam pa yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: aom h'um mi 'gog ci yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnyam pa yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: Om! Hum! The one who does not block anything, who does not do anything, is the same, so the Victorious One has said.

original: 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis //
analyzed: 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis //
translated: By singing this song,

original: mya ngan 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon //
translated: one will become the protector of all those who go to nirvana.

original: stong ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: stong ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: On the mandala of the empty Dharma,

original: dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain the great austerity.

original: zhes gnyis su med par gleng ngo //
analyzed: zhes gnyis su med par gleng ngo //
translated: Thus he spoke in nonduality.

original: de nas / snying po mchog gi yi ge ni //
analyzed: de nas / snying po mchog gi yi ge ni //
translated: Then: The supreme essence syllable

original: dang po'i gnas su bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dang po'i gnas su bsgom par bya //
translated: is to be meditated on in the first place.

original: de snying yi ge bzhi pa ste //
analyzed: de snying yi ge bzhi pa ste //
translated: The four syllables in the heart

original: rdo rje chen po gsal ba mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po gsal ba mchog /
translated: The supreme clarity of the great vajra

original: yi ge aa ldan thig le che //
analyzed: yi ge aa ldan thig le che //
translated: Has the letter A and is endowed with a great drop.

original: chos kun 'dus par rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: chos kun 'dus par rnam par bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the gathering of all phenomena.

original: dang por me long lta bu ste //
analyzed: dang por me long lta bu ste //
translated: First, it is like a mirror,

original: mnyes pa'i kha dog shin tu 'bar //
analyzed: mnyes pa'i kha dog shin tu 'bar //
translated: With a delightful color, very radiant.

original: phyag lag 'khyud pa sprod pa yis //
analyzed: phyag lag 'khyud pa sprod pa yis //
translated: By joining the hands in embrace,

original: thams cad de dang 'dra bar gsal //
analyzed: thams cad de dang 'dra bar gsal //
translated: Everything is clear, just like that.

original: aom h'um su ra ta su ke dzny'a na da aom a'am h'um/
analyzed: aom h'um su ra ta su ke dzny'a na da aom a'am h'um/
translated: Om hum surata sukhe jnana dada om aam hum

original: bder gshegs rgyal mo mkha' dbyings su //
analyzed: bder gshegs rgyal mo mkha' dbyings su //
translated: In the space of the sky of the queen of the sugatas,

original: gsal dag las rnams 'grub par bsgom //
analyzed: gsal dag las rnams 'grub par bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the accomplishment of clear, pure activities.

original: chu skyes padma 'dab @9a *//
analyzed: chu skyes padma 'dab @9a *//
translated: On a lotus with a thousand petals,

original: ma stong // bshad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: ma stong // bshad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the sound of explanation,

original: de steng chos kyi sku ru gsal //
analyzed: de steng chos kyi sku ru gsal //
translated: On top of that, the dharmakaya is clear.

original: zla rgyas lta bu'i mkha' dbyings nas //
analyzed: zla rgyas lta bu'i mkha' dbyings nas //
translated: In the space of the sky like a full moon,

original: thams cad bsdu ba gsum gyis bsdus //
analyzed: thams cad bsdu ba gsum gyis bsdus //
translated: Everything is gathered by the three gatherings.

original: aom su ra tva su khe dharma dha tu sva bh'a wa aom a'a: h'um/
analyzed: aom su ra tva su khe dharma dha tu sva bh'a wa aom a'a: h'um/
translated: Om suratva sukhe dharmadhatu svabhava om aam hum

original: gnyis su med pa'i yi ge mchog /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i yi ge mchog /
translated: The supreme nondual syllable

original: mi skye ba ni aa dang ldan //
analyzed: mi skye ba ni aa dang ldan //
translated: Has nonarising endowed with A.

original: byin rlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: byin rlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gnas //
translated: The blessing is the place of all victors.

original: mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan //
analyzed: mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan //
translated: And the eight offerings, clearly present.

original: so sor gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la //
analyzed: so sor gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la //
translated: In the space of the clear individual,

original: h'um gi zer gyis reg par mdzad //
analyzed: h'um gi zer gyis reg par mdzad //
translated: The light rays of HŪṂ touch them.

original: aom su ra tva su khe na pra dzny'a bhaksha svabh'a w'a aom a'a: h'um/
analyzed: aom su ra tva su khe na pra dzny'a bhaksha svabh'a w'a aom a'a: h'um/
translated: OṂ SURAT SU KHE NA PRAJÑĀ BHAKSHA SVABHĀVĀ OṂ ĀḤ HŪṂ🔽The great rain of bodhicitta,

original: byang chub sems kyi char chen ni; ;yi ge gnyis ba rtsa dmar sku //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi char chen ni; ;yi ge gnyis ba rtsa dmar sku //
translated: The two syllables, the red-bodied nāḍī,

original: gnyis su med par ldan pa na //
analyzed: gnyis su med par ldan pa na //
translated: Uniting in nonduality,

original: bdud kun rnam par btul ba dang // dbyings kyi bde la gsal ba ni //
analyzed: bdud kun rnam par btul ba dang // dbyings kyi bde la gsal ba ni //
translated: All māras are subdued, and the bliss of space is clear.

original: sgo dbye ba yi tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: sgo dbye ba yi tshul gyis ni //
translated: In the manner of opening a door,

original: padma dbye ba sna tshogs bya //
analyzed: padma dbye ba sna tshogs bya //
translated: One should open the various lotuses.

original: spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis //
analyzed: spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis //
translated: Through emanating and gathering,

original: bya ba nan tan ye shes bskyed //
analyzed: bya ba nan tan ye shes bskyed //
translated: The gnosis of purposeful activity is generated.

original: 'di ltar rgyal ba kun mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyal ba kun mdzad pa //
translated: Thus, all victors perform

original: sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab las //
analyzed: sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab las //
translated: Emanations beyond imagination.

original: mchod pa mang po lha mor ldan //
analyzed: mchod pa mang po lha mor ldan //
translated: Many offerings are endowed with goddesses.

original: aom su ra tva su khe na dushta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aom a'a: h'um/
analyzed: aom su ra tva su khe na dushta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aom a'a: h'um/
translated: OṂ SURAT SU KHE NA DUṢṬA JÑĀNA VAJRA SVABHĀVĀ OṂ ĀḤ HŪṂ

original: rnal 'byor skal ldan chen po ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor skal ldan chen po ni //
translated: The great, fortunate yogi/nī

original: skal ngan kun gyi gsos su gsungs //
analyzed: skal ngan kun gyi gsos su gsungs //
translated: Are taught as the nourishment for all unfortunate ones.

original: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: The nondual bodhicitta

original: mam sa bshang gci rdzas rnams ni //
analyzed: mam sa bshang gci rdzas rnams ni //
translated: Is the substance of feces and urine.

original: dogs pa med pa'i dngos grub ste //
analyzed: dogs pa med pa'i dngos grub ste //
translated: The siddhi free of doubt

original: rgyal ba nyid la rgyal bas mchod //
analyzed: rgyal ba nyid la rgyal bas mchod //
translated: Is the Victor himself, worshipped by the Victor.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po las //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po las //
translated: From the Secret Essence of All Tathāgatas,

original: bag chags @9b gtan la 'bebs pa gnyis su med par gleng ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: bag chags @9b gtan la 'bebs pa gnyis su med par gleng ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: The chapter on the nondual elucidation of the latent tendencies, the third.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni /
translated: Then the Bhagavān, the supreme mudrā of the secret essence indivisible from Vajrayoginī,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya las //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya las //
translated: From the mudrā of the web of magic

original: mdzes par gsal ba yab yum bcu //
analyzed: mdzes par gsal ba yab yum bcu //
translated: The ten beautiful fathers and mothers

original: sor mo phan tshun spel legs pa //
analyzed: sor mo phan tshun spel legs pa //
translated: Are the fingers well-spread in pairs,

original: rdo rje thal mo byang chub rgya //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo byang chub rgya //
translated: The vajra palms are the mudrā of enlightenment.

original: gsang ba rnal 'byor thugs kyi mchog /
analyzed: gsang ba rnal 'byor thugs kyi mchog /
translated: The secret yoga is the supreme mind,

original: dam tshig sdom pa 'da' bar dka'//
analyzed: dam tshig sdom pa 'da' bar dka'//
translated: The samaya vow is difficult to transgress.

original: rnal 'byor pa la aa l'i gsal //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la aa l'i gsal //
translated: For the yogi, the āli is clear.

original: kun du bzang la ka ra byed /
analyzed: kun du bzang la ka ra byed /
translated: The universal good is the karana.

original: lnga char zung du ldan pa ni //
analyzed: lnga char zung du ldan pa ni //
translated: The union of all five

original: gcig tu gyur pas gar gyi gzhi //
analyzed: gcig tu gyur pas gar gyi gzhi //
translated: is the basis of dance through becoming one.

original: aom h'um tram a'a: h'um/
analyzed: aom h'um tram a'a: h'um/
translated: Om hum tram ah hum.

original: m'a a'a k'a h'um r'a /
analyzed: m'a a'a k'a h'um r'a /
translated: Ma a ka hum ra.

original: thal mo btang snyoms tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: thal mo btang snyoms tshul gyis ni //
translated: With the gesture of equanimity,

original: mdzes pa'i mtha' na gar gyis bya //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i mtha' na gar gyis bya //
translated: dance at the edge of the beautiful.

original: snying gar bcings pas rnal 'byor don //🔽gar gyi phyag rgya dang nyid pas //
analyzed: snying gar bcings pas rnal 'byor don // gar gyi phyag rgya dang nyid pas //
translated: Binding at the heart, the meaning of yoga,🔽through the dance of the mudra,

original: gar du byas pas thal mo bsnol //
analyzed: gar du byas pas thal mo bsnol //
translated: the dance is performed with the palms joined.

original: mjug tu dbul ba'i tshul gyis bstod //
analyzed: mjug tu dbul ba'i tshul gyis bstod //
translated: In the end, praise with the gesture of offering.

original: rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las //
analyzed: rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las //
translated: From the mudra of the dance of the vajra,

original: g-yon pa rtse gsum g-yas pas gzung //
analyzed: g-yon pa rtse gsum g-yas pas gzung //
translated: hold the three points with the left and the right.🔽That very [mudra] is pierced elsewhere.

original: de nyid gzhan du 'bigs par bya; ;rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las //
analyzed: de nyid gzhan du 'bigs par bya; ;rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las //
translated: From the mudra of the dance of the vajra,

original: dga' ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: dga' ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yis //
translated: with a delighted expression,

original: g-yas su 'dud pa'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: g-yas su 'dud pa'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: with the manner of bowing to the right,

analyzed: rdo rje gar ni de dag las //

analyzed: de nyid gnyis ka thal mo bsdam //

analyzed: aom h'um/ aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i badzra dhu pe badzra garbhe su khe na p'u dza ya p'u dza ya /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, the incense of the vajra, the vajra essence, the offering of the vessel, please be pleased, please be pleased.

original: aom tang tang tang h'um/
analyzed: aom tang tang tang h'um/

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i badzra pushpe badzra garbhe su khe na p'u dza ya p'u dza ya /

original: h'am h'am h'am aam/
analyzed: h'am h'am h'am aam/

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i badzra a'a lo ka dzny'a na mandal ti la ka buddha su khe na p'u dza ya p'u dza ya /

original: aom hri hri hri aom a'a: h'um/
analyzed: aom hri hri hri aom a'a: h'um/

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i badzra gandhe badzra garbhe mah'a mandal ti la ka su ke na p'u dza ya p'u dza ya /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i badzra gandhe badzra garbhe mah'a mandal ti la ka su ke na p'u dza ya p'u dza ya /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, the perfume of the vajra, the vajra essence, the great maṇḍala, the offering of the vessel, please be pleased, please be pleased.

original: aa aa aa /
analyzed: aa aa aa /
translated: Aḥ aḥ aḥ.🔽Oṃ aḥ hūṃ.

original: aom a'a: h'um/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog las /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog las /
translated: From the Supreme Delight of All Tathāgatas,

original: gar gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: gar gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
translated: the chapter on dance is the fourth.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig bla na med pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;thams cad sdom pa la gnas par mkhyen no //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig bla na med pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;thams cad sdom pa la gnas par mkhyen no //
translated: Then the Blessed One, together with the Great Joyful One, entered the samadhi called The Array of the Ornament of the Unsurpassed Samaya, and knew that all were abiding in the vows.

original: dam tshig chen po 'di dag gsungs //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po 'di dag gsungs //
translated: These great samayas were proclaimed:

original: so so'i theg pa bsam yas pa //
analyzed: so so'i theg pa bsam yas pa //
translated: The inconceivable individual vehicles,

original: so sor nyes pa med na bde //
analyzed: so sor nyes pa med na bde //
translated: are individually faultless and blissful.

original: 'jig rten pa la chad mdo @11a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la chad mdo @11a *//
translated: For the worldly, the Vinaya is strict,

original: btsan; ;'dul ba 'dzin la bsrungs na bde //
analyzed: btsan; ;'dul ba 'dzin la bsrungs na bde //
translated: but if guarded by the Vinaya holders, it is blissful.

original: gtsang sbrar spyod la gtsang sbrar spyad //
analyzed: gtsang sbrar spyod la gtsang sbrar spyad //
translated: For the pure conduct, pure conduct is practiced.

original: mi dge ldog na dge ba bcu //
analyzed: mi dge ldog na dge ba bcu //
translated: If turning away from non-virtue, the ten virtues

original: spyad pas lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin //
analyzed: spyad pas lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin //
translated: are practiced, the higher worlds are attained.

original: rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: By the samadhi of one's own purpose,

original: byang chub sa la gnas pa'i rnams //🔽nyams pa med de ma bcol na //
analyzed: byang chub sa la gnas pa'i rnams // nyams pa med de ma bcol na //
translated: those abiding on the bodhisattva grounds🔽are undiminished. If not entrusted,

original: nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub //
analyzed: nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub //
translated: they are undiminished and accomplished.

original: rnal 'byor spyad pa spyod pas 'grub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyad pa spyod pas 'grub //
translated: It is accomplished by practicing the yoga.

original: tshig cis goms pas theg pa 'joms //
analyzed: tshig cis goms pas theg pa 'joms //
translated: By familiarizing with the words, the vehicle is destroyed.

original: gtso mchog bshes gnyen mi spong zhing //
analyzed: gtso mchog bshes gnyen mi spong zhing //
translated: Do not abandon the supreme friend,

original: bkur sti rim gro mchog kyang bskyed //
analyzed: bkur sti rim gro mchog kyang bskyed //
translated: And also generate supreme respect and service.

original: ting 'dzin goms par cha lugs bsgom //
analyzed: ting 'dzin goms par cha lugs bsgom //
translated: Cultivate the appearance of being familiar with samadhi.

original: tshig gi bzlas pa bar mi gcad //
analyzed: tshig gi bzlas pa bar mi gcad //
translated: Do not interrupt the recitation of the words.

original: dam tshig mched la gdung ba bskyed //
analyzed: dam tshig mched la gdung ba bskyed //
translated: Generate longing for the siblings of samaya.

original: sku yi dam tshig bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sku yi dam tshig bsam mi khyab //
translated: The samaya of body is inconceivable.

original: gsung gi dam tshig bsngags pa yin //
analyzed: gsung gi dam tshig bsngags pa yin //
translated: The samaya of speech is praise.

original: thugs kyi dam tshig lhag par gsungs //
analyzed: thugs kyi dam tshig lhag par gsungs //
translated: The samaya of mind is said to be superior.

original: rigs lnga bsrung ba'i dam tshig rnams //
analyzed: rigs lnga bsrung ba'i dam tshig rnams //
translated: The samayas of the five families

original: nyams na shin du skong bar dka'//
analyzed: nyams na shin du skong bar dka'//
translated: are difficult to restore if they are damaged.

original: spyad pa'i dam tshig rdzas rnams ni //
analyzed: spyad pa'i dam tshig rdzas rnams ni //
translated: The samaya substances of conduct

original: nyams na myur bar bskang ba yin //
analyzed: nyams na myur bar bskang ba yin //
translated: are quickly restored if damaged.🔽If the damaged samayas are not restored due to laziness,

original: nyams pa ma bskangs le lo yis; ;sangs rgyas kun dang gcugs chen te //
analyzed: nyams pa ma bskangs le lo yis; ;sangs rgyas kun dang gcugs chen te //
translated: all buddhas will be greatly displeased.🔽One will definitely be born

original: 'khyams pa rnam pa bcu por ni //🔽myur bar skye bar nges pa ste //
analyzed: 'khyams pa rnam pa bcu por ni // myur bar skye bar nges pa ste //
translated: in one of the ten kinds of wandering.

original: de bas rigs kyi bu mchog ni //🔽mchog dang tha ma 'bring gi rnams /
analyzed: de bas rigs kyi bu mchog ni // mchog dang tha ma 'bring gi rnams /
translated: Therefore, the supreme child of family🔽should practice the supreme, average, and inferior

original: rab kyis bar chad med par spyad //
analyzed: rab kyis bar chad med par spyad //
translated: without interruption.

original: 'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste //
analyzed: 'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste //
translated: The middling one should do it in years, months, and the six times,

original: tha mas lo mtshams mi bzla zhes //
analyzed: tha mas lo mtshams mi bzla zhes //
translated: And the lesser one should not pass a year or a month,

original: rgyal ba rnams kyis shin tu gsungs //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyis shin tu gsungs //
translated: So it is taught by the Victorious Ones.

original: rdo rje dri dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: rdo rje dri dang byang chub sems //
translated: The vajra scent, bodhicitta,

original: @11b rakta dri chen tshe chen po //
analyzed: @11b rakta dri chen tshe chen po //
translated: Rakta, great feces, and great life,

original: dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas //
analyzed: dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas //
translated: Fully endowed with a pure vessel,

original: byin gyis brlabs te 'thung byed pa //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs te 'thung byed pa //
translated: One should drink it, consecrated.

original: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste //
translated: One who abides in the vows and samayas,

original: 'das na brlag pa chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: 'das na brlag pa chen por 'gyur //
translated: If transgressed, will bring about great destruction.

original: mnyam par bzhag pa'i chos thams cad //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa'i chos thams cad //
translated: All phenomena of equipoise

original: mnyam par shes pas spyad pa dang // mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba na //
analyzed: mnyam par shes pas spyad pa dang // mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba na //
translated: Are practiced by knowing them to be the same, and when they are clear as equality,

original: rnal 'byor sems dpa' yin zhes gsungs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sems dpa' yin zhes gsungs //
translated: It is said to be the yoga of the bodhisattvas.

original: rnal 'byor snod du bya ba gang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor snod du bya ba gang //
translated: Whatever is to be made into a vessel for yoga,

original: rdzas kyis bsngags pa yod pa rnams //
analyzed: rdzas kyis bsngags pa yod pa rnams //
translated: All substances that are praised

original: rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya //
analyzed: rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya //
translated: Should be thoroughly washed and polished.

original: ka la pingka'i mdog bzhin du //
analyzed: ka la pingka'i mdog bzhin du //
translated: Like the color of a kalaviṅka bird,

original: gzhong bu phor bu snod kyi rnams //
analyzed: gzhong bu phor bu snod kyi rnams //
translated: The bowls, cups, and vessels

original: dri ma bkru zhing mdzes par bya //
analyzed: dri ma bkru zhing mdzes par bya //
translated: Should be washed and made beautiful.

original: dus gsum du ni sman sbyar ba //
analyzed: dus gsum du ni sman sbyar ba //

original: dang por dngul gyi gzhong par sbyar //🔽de nas ra gan gzhong pa ste //
analyzed: dang por dngul gyi gzhong par sbyar // de nas ra gan gzhong pa ste //
translated: First, it is applied to a silver dish,🔽then to a brass dish,

original: zangs kyi gzhong par sbyar ba ni //
analyzed: zangs kyi gzhong par sbyar ba ni //
translated: and then it is applied to a copper dish.

original: srang re sbyar ba'i sman rnams las //
analyzed: srang re sbyar ba'i sman rnams las //
translated: From the medicines applied in each ounce,

original: zangs dang dngul dang ra gan nam //
analyzed: zangs dang dngul dang ra gan nam //
translated: copper, silver, brass,

original: gser dang lcags su rab bsres la //
analyzed: gser dang lcags su rab bsres la //
translated: gold, and iron are thoroughly mixed.

original: rnam rtog nad la sman sbyar ba //
analyzed: rnam rtog nad la sman sbyar ba //

original: mand'a ra ba'i mdog bzhin sbyar //
analyzed: mand'a ra ba'i mdog bzhin sbyar //
translated: It is applied like the color of a mandārava.

original: mand'a ra bar ma gyur tshe //
analyzed: mand'a ra bar ma gyur tshe //
translated: When it does not become a mandārava,

original: nam yang sbyar bar ma gsungs te; ;nyi zla dus gcig shar ba na //
analyzed: nam yang sbyar bar ma gsungs te; ;nyi zla dus gcig shar ba na //
translated: it is never said to be applied.

original: de nas rdzas kyi bsngags pa las //🔽sman gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam //
analyzed: de nas rdzas kyi bsngags pa las // sman gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam //
translated: Then, from the praise of substances,🔽the application of medicine is begun.

original: shin tu sman rnams 'byor pa na //
analyzed: shin tu sman rnams 'byor pa na //
translated: When the medicines are well combined,

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsam yas su //
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsam yas su //
translated: in the inconceivable maṇḍala of light,

original: ka la pingka'i mdog tu brtag /
analyzed: ka la pingka'i mdog tu brtag /
translated: it is imagined to be the color of a kalaviṅka.

original: 'di la gang zhig mi brtson pa //
analyzed: 'di la gang zhig mi brtson pa //
translated: One who does not strive in this

original: dam tshig mi btsun sdom pa med //
analyzed: dam tshig mi btsun sdom pa med //
translated: is not a disciplined upholder of the sacred pledge.

original: rdo rje spun las dben par gdon //
analyzed: rdo rje spun las dben par gdon //
translated: He is expelled from the vajra siblings.

original: lha dang rdo rje slob dpon la //
analyzed: lha dang rdo rje slob dpon la //
translated: To the deity and the vajra master

original: bag med par ni @12a *//
analyzed: bag med par ni @12a *//
translated: he is careless.

original: brnyas pa dang // rmongs pas ma mthong g-yel ba dang // dam chos srog la mi lta ba //
analyzed: brnyas pa dang // rmongs pas ma mthong g-yel ba dang // dam chos srog la mi lta ba //
translated: ignorance, neglect, and not valuing the life of the true Dharma,

original: sangs rgyas rgyal ba bdun la brnyas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rgyal ba bdun la brnyas //
translated: are the seven offenses against the Victorious Ones, the Buddhas.🔽Those who perform the activities of the maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor ba yi las byas pa; ;sems can dmyal ba chen po ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ba yi las byas pa; ;sems can dmyal ba chen po ste //
translated: will be reborn in the great hells,🔽with short lives, afflicted by illness,

original: tshe thung nad kyis btab pa dang // 'jig rten 'di ru gnod pa mang //
analyzed: tshe thung nad kyis btab pa dang // 'jig rten 'di ru gnod pa mang //
translated: and harmed in this world.

original: shi nas dmyal ba ngan song skye //🔽de bas sdom pa 'di dag las //
analyzed: shi nas dmyal ba ngan song skye // de bas sdom pa 'di dag las //
translated: After death, they will be reborn in the hells, in the lower realms.🔽Therefore, there is no transgression

original: 'da' bar mdzad pa gang yang med //
analyzed: 'da' bar mdzad pa gang yang med //
translated: of these vows.

original: 'di las 'das par mi byed pas //
analyzed: 'di las 'das par mi byed pas //
translated: Since one should not transgress them,

original: tshe 'di nyid la rgyal ba'i sku //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la rgyal ba'i sku //
translated: in this very life, the body of the Victorious One

original: lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas //
translated: resides on the spontaneously accomplished stage.

original: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa 'dis shin tu bsnyengs par mdzad do //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa 'dis shin tu bsnyengs par mdzad do //
translated: Thus, all the Tathāgatas themselves are extremely guarded by this vow of the Great Vow.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bde ba sdom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bde ba sdom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the fifth chapter, called The Supreme of All Vows, from The Tantra of the Secret Bliss of All Tathāgatas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do //
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Great Samantabhadra, together with the yoginīs, abided in a single intention.

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa nyid dang / zab mo'i don yin par mkhyen to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa nyid dang / zab mo'i don yin par mkhyen to //
translated: The great lord of yogins, endowed with supreme conduct, understood all conduct and the profound meaning.

original: mkhyen nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: mkhyen nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs so //
translated: Having understood, he taught this method of the Great Illusion.

original: ae ma chos dbyings rnam dag spyod yul las //
analyzed: ae ma chos dbyings rnam dag spyod yul las //
translated: Ema! From the pure sphere of reality, the domain,

original: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ston ya mtshan 'phrul chen yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ston ya mtshan 'phrul chen yin //
translated: The teaching of both buddhas and sentient beings is a great wondrous illusion.

original: de yang ye shes tshogs las sna @12b tshogs snang mod kyi //
analyzed: de yang ye shes tshogs las sna @12b tshogs snang mod kyi //
translated: Moreover, although various appearances arise from the accumulation of wisdom,

original: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma las ni rab tu sprul te 'char //
analyzed: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma las ni rab tu sprul te 'char //
translated: They emanate and arise from the illusions of all women.

original: bden gnyis so sor snang ba nyid kyang yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: bden gnyis so sor snang ba nyid kyang yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: The appearance of the two truths individually is also called the space of the mother by the victors.

original: ma nor lam chen sgom na kun tu bzang mo bsgoms pas lam du zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: ma nor lam chen sgom na kun tu bzang mo bsgoms pas lam du zhugs pa yin //
translated: If one meditates on the unmistaken great path, by meditating on Samantabhadrī, one enters the path.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun shes rab bud med las ni mchod cing bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun shes rab bud med las ni mchod cing bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub bo //
translated: The wisdom of all the buddhas is known through the worship and service of a woman, and one attains great intuition.

original: dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog gi la rdo rje glu'i don de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa la gsal bar gyur te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog gi la rdo rje glu'i don de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa la gsal bar gyur te /
translated: The meaning of the vajra song of the supreme siddhi of the activity of drawing the maṇḍala is clear in the nondual transcendent state.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang / shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang / shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, the one who is the nature of all the tathāgatas, glorious Samantabhadra, spoke this enjoyment of method and wisdom:

original: mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa ni //
translated: “The engagement in the activity of killing

original: phan tshun du ni dga' spyod pa //
analyzed: phan tshun du ni dga' spyod pa //
translated: is the enjoyment of each other

original: rnal 'byor sdom la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sdom la gnas pa yin //
translated: and abiding in the yoga of the vow.

original: de la mchod pa dam pa ni //🔽sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste //
analyzed: de la mchod pa dam pa ni // sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste //
translated: “The supreme worship of that🔽is the application of union.

original: kun tu khyab pa kun tu sbyor //
analyzed: kun tu khyab pa kun tu sbyor //
translated: The union of the all-pervading

original: rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog /
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog /
translated: is the supreme pledge of passion.

original: de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan //
analyzed: de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan //
translated: “Therefore, one should have the color of a karavīra flower,

original: bcu drug bong tshod ring ba la //
analyzed: bcu drug bong tshod ring ba la //
translated: the size of a sixteen-year-old,

original: lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste //
analyzed: lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste //

analyzed: lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba dbyes che kos ko phra //

original: nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring //
analyzed: nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring //
translated: small breasts, and long fingers,

original: yid tsam bzur la mig dkyus ring //
analyzed: yid tsam bzur la mig dkyus ring //

original: dkar zhing rtsa dmar mdangs su chags //
analyzed: dkar zhing rtsa dmar mdangs su chags //

original: so dkar thags bzang 'tshams thung zhing //
analyzed: so dkar thags bzang 'tshams thung zhing //

analyzed: skad sbom gdangs dang ldan pa ni // rdo rje sems dpa'i @13a *//

original: gnas mchog ste //
analyzed: gnas mchog ste //

original: 'di la rtse bar byed pa ni //
analyzed: 'di la rtse bar byed pa ni //
translated: One who plays with her

original: rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za //
analyzed: rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za //

original: tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur //

analyzed: gnas rab dben par rab brtags te; ;sha dkar mdangs ldan mdog dang ldan //
translated: one with white flesh, a radiant complexion,

analyzed: lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can //

analyzed: so dkar thags dam mig dkyus zlum // skad phra mdog dkar spro ring ba //

analyzed: dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa //

analyzed: rma dag gnas pa la sogs ni //

analyzed: rtag par chos la 'dud pa yin //

analyzed: tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis //

analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur //

analyzed: bud med cha lugs legs pa ni //

analyzed: bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing //

analyzed: lus la mtshon gyi rma 'dras brgyan //

analyzed: tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan //

analyzed: gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od //

original: rdo rje padmar ldan byas te //
analyzed: rdo rje padmar ldan byas te //

original: phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na //
analyzed: phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na //
translated: Having engaged in mutual delight,🔽In an instant, one will become

analyzed: 'dod khams lha yi skad cig gis //

original: 'grub par 'gyur ba @13b gdon mi za //

analyzed: lus zlum brtun dang nga rgyal bcas //

analyzed: khong na tshig rnon sems la 'dzin //

original: bya bar dran la mi gtong ldan //
analyzed: bya bar dran la mi gtong ldan //

original: bslab ba blo rtul sha rus che //
analyzed: bslab ba blo rtul sha rus che //

analyzed: mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir che; ;sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dad //

analyzed: rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis //

analyzed: bag chags yi ges rtsad gcod cing //

original: ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na //
analyzed: ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na //

analyzed: bsgrub pa dus la bab pa ste //

original: de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis //
analyzed: de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis //

analyzed: yum gyi padma kha bye ste //

original: bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'phro yis //
analyzed: bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'phro yis //
translated: and, through the proliferation of bliss,

analyzed: phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na //

original: rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni //
analyzed: rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni //

analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur //
translated: will be attained in this very lifetime.

original: thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis //
analyzed: thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis //

analyzed: 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs //
translated: the inferior families in the worlds

original: rab tu bkug ste dga' spyod na //
analyzed: rab tu bkug ste dga' spyod na //

analyzed: snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa //

analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa chen por gsungs // shan pa rigs ngan smad 'tshong ba //
translated: he is said to be a great practitioner.🔽Butchers, low-caste people, prostitutes,

analyzed: ngan pa'i rigs dang longs spyod rnams // 'joms pa po yis ting 'dzin gyis //

analyzed: myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs //
translated: if practiced by one who is destroying.🔽Ghosts, yakṣas, animals,

analyzed: yi dvags gnod sbyin byol song dang // khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs //
translated: dogs, turtles, monkeys, and so on,

original: mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun //
analyzed: mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun //
translated: in all the excellent abodes of humans and gods,

original: so sor 'tsham par dga' spyad na //
analyzed: so sor 'tsham par dga' spyad na //
translated: having enjoyed each one appropriately,

original: dregs pa can la zhi ba che //
analyzed: dregs pa can la zhi ba che //
translated: the haughty are subdued by the great peace,

original: brtson la dga' ba brtson par mdzad //
analyzed: brtson la dga' ba brtson par mdzad //
translated: the diligent are made diligent,

original: thabs kyi mdzad spyod kun gyi mchog /
analyzed: thabs kyi mdzad spyod kun gyi mchog /
translated: the supreme of all skillful deeds.

original: sems can 'di dag don gyi phyir //
analyzed: sems can 'di dag don gyi phyir //
translated: For the sake of these sentient beings,

original: phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams //
translated: those who practice perversely

original: 'dul ba'i mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis //

original: mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med //
analyzed: mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med //

original: shin @14a *// tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis //
analyzed: shin @14a *// tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis //
