original: gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad //
analyzed: gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad //
translated: all the fierce ones are brought under control.

original: shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis //
analyzed: shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis //
translated: With a very peaceful appearance,

original: dregs pa can rnams dbang du mdzad //
analyzed: dregs pa can rnams dbang du mdzad //
translated: he subjugates the arrogant ones.

original: shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis //
analyzed: shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis //
translated: With a very radiant appearance,

original: chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad //
analyzed: chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad //
translated: he subjugates the passionate ones.

original: ae ma shin tu ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: ae ma shin tu ngo mtshar che //
translated: Amazing! How very wondrous!

original: ci yang yin pas cir mi dgongs //
analyzed: ci yang yin pas cir mi dgongs //
translated: He is anything at all, yet does not think anything.🔽Thus it is said.

original: zhes gsungs pas thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen po dang ldan par gyur to //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen po dang ldan par gyur to //
translated: All of them became endowed with great diligence.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha' dang mnyam ba rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis mnyan pa brtson par mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha' dang mnyam ba rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis mnyan pa brtson par mdzad do //
translated: The Bhagavān, the Tathāgata, equal to space, with the intention of the dust particles of the inconceivable, with a very diligent mind, listened.

original: rdo rje chos kyi mchog la sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang / gus pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su gzung ba'i le'u mdzad /
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi mchog la sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang / gus pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su gzung ba'i le'u mdzad /
translated: The chapter on the inconceivable family, such as Vajradharma, was composed with utmost respect and devotion.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mos rab tu brtson pa mdzad /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mos rab tu brtson pa mdzad /
translated: Then the Bhagavān, with great diligence, engaged in yoga.

original: rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis sprod pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / gyad kyi dgyes pa dang mgu ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyad do //
analyzed: rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis sprod pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / gyad kyi dgyes pa dang mgu ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyad do //
translated: With a very diligent mind, they engage in giving, embracing, and the supreme delight and satisfaction of the wrestlers.

original: de nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then, from the space of suchness, this was spoken from the vajra body, speech, and mind:🔽Oṃ hūṃ.

original: aom h'um ye shes rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas //
analyzed: aom h'um ye shes rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with the supreme yoga of pristine consciousness,

original: skal bzang mchog gi dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: skal bzang mchog gi dngos grub stsol //
translated: grant the supreme siddhi of good fortune.

original: rab tu rmongs pa gsal phyir 'gog pa kun slong ba //
analyzed: rab tu rmongs pa gsal phyir 'gog pa kun slong ba //
translated: In order to clarify complete cessation,

original: rnal 'byor bde mchog gnyis su med pa 'di dag shin tu ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bde mchog gnyis su med pa 'di dag shin tu ngo mtshar che //
translated: these supreme yogas of nonduality are extremely amazing.

original: rin chen @14b yid bzhin gzungs ni kun gyi dbang ldan pa //
analyzed: rin chen @14b yid bzhin gzungs ni kun gyi dbang ldan pa //
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel dhāraṇī is the lord of all.

original: tshangs ma'i mdangs ldan gzungs ma drangs te de brtson pas //
analyzed: tshangs ma'i mdangs ldan gzungs ma drangs te de brtson pas //
translated: Summon the dhāraṇī consort endowed with the radiance of Brahmā, and through that effort

original: grub par 'gyur ba 'di la dga' spyod aa la la //
analyzed: grub par 'gyur ba 'di la dga' spyod aa la la //
translated: one will attain accomplishment. In this, the conduct of delight is “a la la.”

original: shin tu srid pa 'di dag bzhin du spyad pas 'grub par gsungs pas sa la gnas pas kun pas 'phags //
analyzed: shin tu srid pa 'di dag bzhin du spyad pas 'grub par gsungs pas sa la gnas pas kun pas 'phags //
translated: Since it is said that one will attain accomplishment by engaging in conduct like this, it is superior to all the stages.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun tu bzang po rgyal ba kun pas 'phags //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun tu bzang po rgyal ba kun pas 'phags //
translated: In the midst of all the victors, Samantabhadra is exalted above all victors.

original: de yang kun tu bzang mo yin zhes sngon gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs //
analyzed: de yang kun tu bzang mo yin zhes sngon gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs //
translated: And he is also Samantabhadrī, so it is said by all the victors of the past.

original: mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gtong bas //
analyzed: mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gtong bas //
translated: Free from all signs, she is the union of supreme joy, never abandoning.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyang de yin rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyang de yin rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs //
translated: The hero Vajra is also that, so it is said by all the victors.

original: tshangs pa mchog gi glu 'di dag /
analyzed: tshangs pa mchog gi glu 'di dag /
translated: This song of supreme Brahmā,

original: brtson par byed cing len pa ni //
analyzed: brtson par byed cing len pa ni //
translated: is sung with effort and received.

original: dka' thub rnal 'byor ting 'dzin te //
analyzed: dka' thub rnal 'byor ting 'dzin te //
translated: It is the yoga of austerity, the samādhi.

original: tshangs pa mchog gi dro gcig gis //
analyzed: tshangs pa mchog gi dro gcig gis //
translated: With just one meal of supreme Brahmā,

original: gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs //
translated: it is said that accomplishment is certain.

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen pos gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur par mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen pos gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur par mdzad do //
translated: All the tathāgatas, with great effort, become of one nature.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixth chapter called the Secret Maṇḍala of All Tathāgatas.

original: de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Then, all the teachers of the three times are of the nature of the Sugatas.

original: rab tu mchod pa chen pos mnyes shing ma rig pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul bar mkhyen to //
analyzed: rab tu mchod pa chen pos mnyes shing ma rig pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul bar mkhyen to //
translated: Knowing that they are pleased by the great worship, the eighty-four thousand ignorances are subdued.

original: mkhyen nas ma rig pa grol bar mdzad pa dang / zhe sdang rnam par grol bar dgyes te /🔽de dag mnyam pa chen @15a *//
analyzed: mkhyen nas ma rig pa grol bar mdzad pa dang / zhe sdang rnam par grol bar dgyes te / de dag mnyam pa chen @15a *//
translated: Knowing that, ignorance is liberated, and hatred is delighted to be liberated.

original: po'i rang bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thabs su sgrol ba dang / dbang gi rigs kyi sbyor bas rab tu bsrungs shing srung ba mdzad do //
analyzed: po'i rang bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thabs su sgrol ba dang / dbang gi rigs kyi sbyor bas rab tu bsrungs shing srung ba mdzad do //
translated: Those are liberated by the method of subduing the nature of great equality, and are well protected and guarded by the application of the family of power.

original: bdag gi rnal 'byor kun tu bzang //
analyzed: bdag gi rnal 'byor kun tu bzang //
translated: One’s yoga is Samantabhadra.

original: mtshan nyid kun brtags gnyis su med //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kun brtags gnyis su med //
translated: The imagined characteristics are nondual.

original: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyar na //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyar na //
translated: Having united with all the victors,

original: mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa yin //
translated: one abides on the stage of equality.

original: rang sems zla rgyas dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: rang sems zla rgyas dbus gnas pa //
translated: In the center of the full moon of one’s mind

original: rdo rje // sems dpa'i ting 'dzin te //
analyzed: rdo rje // sems dpa'i ting 'dzin te //
translated: is the samādhi of the vajra being.

original: don rtogs gsal bar gyur pa yis //
analyzed: don rtogs gsal bar gyur pa yis //
translated: The clear realization of the meaning

original: rab tu bsgral ba chen po ste //
analyzed: rab tu bsgral ba chen po ste //
translated: is the great liberation.

original: mchog gi sa la gnas rgyud yin //
analyzed: mchog gi sa la gnas rgyud yin //
translated: Abiding in the supreme stage.

original: sku yi cho 'phrul rigs kun rdzogs gsung gi ston pa bla na med //
analyzed: sku yi cho 'phrul rigs kun rdzogs gsung gi ston pa bla na med //
translated: The magical body of all the buddha families, the unsurpassed teacher of speech,

original: thugs kyi mdzad pa rtags dang ldan //
analyzed: thugs kyi mdzad pa rtags dang ldan //
translated: The enlightened mind of activity endowed with signs,

original: ting 'dzin 'di ltar gsal ba yis //
analyzed: ting 'dzin 'di ltar gsal ba yis //
translated: The clarity of this samadhi

original: blo rmongs sdug bsngal spyad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: blo rmongs sdug bsngal spyad pa'i phyir //
translated: Is for the sake of eliminating the suffering of the deluded mind.

original: gnyis su med par gsal ba yis //
analyzed: gnyis su med par gsal ba yis //
translated: The clarity of nonduality

original: dza: h'um; bam hos bsdu ba mdzad //
analyzed: dza: h'um; bam hos bsdu ba mdzad //
translated: Is the gathering of the jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: mngon spyod las kyi sgrol ba mdzad //
analyzed: mngon spyod las kyi sgrol ba mdzad //
translated: The activity of wrathful liberation

original: gnyis su med par 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis su med par 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Is accomplished in nonduality.

original: rtags dang shes pa phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: rtags dang shes pa phun sum tshogs //
translated: The signs and knowledge are perfect.

original: byams pa mdzad pa rnal 'byor thugs //
analyzed: byams pa mdzad pa rnal 'byor thugs //
translated: The activity of love is the mind of yoga.

original: gzungs kyi mchod pa mnyam ldan pas //🔽rgyal ba mnyes par sbyor shes na //
analyzed: gzungs kyi mchod pa mnyam ldan pas // rgyal ba mnyes par sbyor shes na //
translated: The equal union of the offering of dharani🔽Is the union of delighting the victors.

original: mnyes pa chen pos bdag nyid mchod //
analyzed: mnyes pa chen pos bdag nyid mchod //
translated: Knowing that, one should offer oneself with great delight.

original: bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa'i //
analyzed: bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa'i //
translated: The inseparable truth

original: sems nyid rtogs pa rnam spyad phyir //
analyzed: sems nyid rtogs pa rnam spyad phyir //
translated: Is the realization of the mind itself.

original: ting 'dzin shugs kyis kun bsgral te //
analyzed: ting 'dzin shugs kyis kun bsgral te //
translated: Liberation through the power of samadhi

original: mngon spyod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad //
analyzed: mngon spyod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad //
translated: Is the liberation through the activity of wrath.

original: gsang ba'i mkha' la @15b kun du sbyor //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mkha' la @15b kun du sbyor //
translated: They are united in the secret space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa las /
translated: From the inconceivable deeds of all the tathagatas,

original: mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun pa'o ////
translated: this is the seventh chapter on the reality of offerings.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor rab tu skyong ba la dgyes te slob ma mchog dang / 'bring dang / tha mas yon gyi dbul ba mang po byas te dkyil 'khor du gzud pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor rab tu skyong ba la dgyes te slob ma mchog dang / 'bring dang / tha mas yon gyi dbul ba mang po byas te dkyil 'khor du gzud pa mdzad do //
translated: Then the bhagavat, delighted to protect the retinue, caused the supreme, middling, and lesser disciples to make many offerings and enter the mandala.

original: bgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdong bar bstan /
analyzed: bgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdong bar bstan /
translated: In order to destroy obstacles, he revealed the vajra mind samadhi.

original: rin po ches lag sor bkang ste snying po 'di zlos su gzhug go /
analyzed: rin po ches lag sor bkang ste snying po 'di zlos su gzhug go /
translated: Filling the hands and fingers with jewels, he had them repeat this essence mantra:

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu dzi dhi dha tishtha h'um/
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu dzi dhi dha tishtha h'um/
translated: Om sarva tathagata puja dhi dhiti sthah hum

original: aom mah'a manda la de ba ka ra p'u dza ya p'u dza ya h'um aa /
analyzed: aom mah'a manda la de ba ka ra p'u dza ya p'u dza ya h'um aa /
translated: Om maha mandala deva karapu jayapujaya hum ah

original: zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go /
analyzed: zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go /
translated: Saying this, he had them scatter flowers.

original: gang la bab pa'i bshes gnyen bstan //
analyzed: gang la bab pa'i bshes gnyen bstan //
translated: The deity on which they land indicates the teacher.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya dam tshig bstan //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya dam tshig bstan //
translated: The mantra, mudra, and sacred pledge are taught.

original: de nas dam tshig chu blud cing //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig chu blud cing //
translated: Then, the sacred pledge water is offered,

original: tshig 'di rab tu go bar bsgo //
analyzed: tshig 'di rab tu go bar bsgo //
translated: and this word is well understood:

original: sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po //
analyzed: sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po //
translated: “The great form of sentient beings

original: las la sogs te dbang bskur ba'i //
analyzed: las la sogs te dbang bskur ba'i //
translated: is empowered in the activities and so forth.

original: rgyal ba'i sras su dbang bskur yin //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras su dbang bskur yin //
translated: This is the empowerment into the heirs of the victors.

original: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis //🔽dam tshig gnyan po 'di dag ni //
analyzed: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis // dam tshig gnyan po 'di dag ni //
translated: From this day forward, my child,🔽you must not forsake

original: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhing //
analyzed: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhing //
translated: even for the sake of your life🔽these sacred pledges

original: slob dpon ma gtong grogs la mchod //
analyzed: slob dpon ma gtong grogs la mchod //
translated: and you must honor your spiritual master and friends.

original: bka' la gus par mnyan par byos //
analyzed: bka' la gus par mnyan par byos //
translated: Listen respectfully to the command.

original: gal te bka' las 'das gyur na //
analyzed: gal te bka' las 'das gyur na //
translated: If you transgress the command,🔽you will be destroyed, annihilated, and bound by sacred pledge,

original: gzhom dang gzhig dang dam rtsal dang // spro dang sbar dang dmyal bar skye //
analyzed: gzhom dang gzhig dang dam rtsal dang // spro dang sbar dang dmyal bar skye //
translated: and you will be tormented, burned, and reborn in hell.

original: sems la chu 'di gnas pa ni //
analyzed: sems la chu 'di gnas pa ni //
translated: This water that remains in the mind

original: 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'tsham par bya //
analyzed: 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'tsham par bya //
translated: is suitable for the four activities.”

original: @16a *// zhes brjod nas /
analyzed: @16a *// zhes brjod nas /
translated: Having said that,🔽the vajra master, the maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor dang // kun du bzang dang mchod la sogs //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor dang // kun du bzang dang mchod la sogs //
translated: Samantabhadra, and the offerings and so forth

original: zhabs la gtugs dang gus par bya //
analyzed: zhabs la gtugs dang gus par bya //
translated: are to be served and respected.

original: rgyud kyi mnyan pa thams cad bya; ;sgrub pa'i gzugs la brten pas 'grub //
analyzed: rgyud kyi mnyan pa thams cad bya; ;sgrub pa'i gzugs la brten pas 'grub //
translated: Accomplishment is attained by relying on the form of practice.

original: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog la //
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog la //
translated: Then, to the supreme son of family,

original: gsang ba'i ming gi dbang yang bskur //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ming gi dbang yang bskur //
translated: The empowerment of the secret name is also conferred.

original: gus par ldan pa'i bu mchog nges //
analyzed: gus par ldan pa'i bu mchog nges //
translated: The supreme son who is endowed with devotion

original: rgyal po dbang yod rgyal po srid //
analyzed: rgyal po dbang yod rgyal po srid //
translated: Is certainly a powerful king, a king of kings.🔽One's own body, abode, retinue, country,🔽Sons, wife, and family line,

original: rang lus gnas dang 'khor yul dang // bu dang chung ma tsha rgyud dang // rin po che dang shel dang dngul //
analyzed: rang lus gnas dang 'khor yul dang // bu dang chung ma tsha rgyud dang // rin po che dang shel dang dngul //
translated: Precious stones, crystals, and silver,

original: sna bdun rin chen nor gyi dbyig /
analyzed: sna bdun rin chen nor gyi dbyig /
translated: The seven precious substances, wealth, and riches,🔽Horses, elephants, chariots,

original: rta dang glang po shing rta dang // ma he ne'u le ci yod rnams //
analyzed: rta dang glang po shing rta dang // ma he ne'u le ci yod rnams //
translated: Water buffaloes, goats, and whatever else there is,

original: gter dang dbyig dang yid 'thad pa //
analyzed: gter dang dbyig dang yid 'thad pa //
translated: Treasures, wealth, and what is pleasing to the mind,

original: sems la the tshom med pa yis //
analyzed: sems la the tshom med pa yis //
translated: Without doubt in one's mind,

original: bkur sti rim gro mchog bskyed la //
analyzed: bkur sti rim gro mchog bskyed la //
translated: Having generated supreme respect and service,

original: phul na rgyal ba mnyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: phul na rgyal ba mnyes par 'gyur //
translated: If offered, the Victorious Ones will be pleased.

original: de nas dbang snod theg pa'i tshad //
analyzed: de nas dbang snod theg pa'i tshad //
translated: Then, the measure of the vehicle of the empowerment vessel

original: rim pa bzhin du mnod par bya //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du mnod par bya //
translated: Should be taken up in stages.

original: mnyan pa grub pa la sogs dang // las dang ging dang rgyal 'theb dang // spyan dang rdo rje tshad 'dzin pa //
analyzed: mnyan pa grub pa la sogs dang // las dang ging dang rgyal 'theb dang // spyan dang rdo rje tshad 'dzin pa //
translated: the eye, and the vajra measure,

original: bye brag mngag pa la sogs rnams //
analyzed: bye brag mngag pa la sogs rnams //
translated: the specific messengers, and so forth.

original: gsang ba'i dbang rnams gang nod pa //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang rnams gang nod pa //
translated: Those who have received the secret empowerment

original: nyi shu'am bcu gnyis lon pa la //
analyzed: nyi shu'am bcu gnyis lon pa la //
translated: should be twenty or twelve years old.🔽Clothes, crown, food and drink,

original: gos dang dbu rgyan bza' btung dang // phyag rgya dril bu la sogs pa //
analyzed: gos dang dbu rgyan bza' btung dang // phyag rgya dril bu la sogs pa //
translated: mudra, bell, and so forth,

original: dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgoms te //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgoms te //
translated: should be visualized in this way in the mandala.

original: rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: Blessed by all the victors,

original: mngon du stan bting dga' spyod cing //
analyzed: mngon du stan bting dga' spyod cing //
translated: the seat is spread out, and one enjoys it.

original: steng nas rgyal pos dbang bskur na //
analyzed: steng nas rgyal pos dbang bskur na //
translated: If the king confers empowerment from above,

original: gdon mi za bar @16b dngos grub thob //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar @16b dngos grub thob //
translated: there is no doubt that one will attain spiritual powers.

original: tshig gi legs par bstod par bya //
analyzed: tshig gi legs par bstod par bya //
translated: One should praise with these excellent words.

original: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
translated: Then, the supreme son of family

original: zhabs la gtugs de gtang rag gtong //
analyzed: zhabs la gtugs de gtang rag gtong //
translated: should touch the feet and give thanks.

original: rdo rje spun dang gzungs ma yis //
analyzed: rdo rje spun dang gzungs ma yis //
translated: The vajra siblings and the knowledge consorts

original: rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod //
translated: should say, You are the victor of the victors.

original: dus gsum kun gyi sras chen po //
analyzed: dus gsum kun gyi sras chen po //
translated: The great son of all three times

original: dus gsum kun gyi spyad pa spyod //
analyzed: dus gsum kun gyi spyad pa spyod //
translated: One who practices in all three times,

original: khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba po //
analyzed: khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba po //
translated: The liberator of all three realms,

original: sgrol ba mchog gi spyad pa spyod //
analyzed: sgrol ba mchog gi spyad pa spyod //
translated: One who practices the supreme liberation.

original: shin tu rnal 'byor skal ldan pa //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor skal ldan pa //
translated: The fortunate one of the highest yoga,🔽Who abides in the commitments and vows,

original: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa dang // mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing //
analyzed: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa dang // mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing //
translated: Drinks the water of signlessness,

original: ji ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa //
translated: And performs the activities as instructed,

original: kun la phyad par rab grags yin //
analyzed: kun la phyad par rab grags yin //
translated: Is renowned as the all-pervading one.

original: phyi rabs 'dren pa'i gdung 'dzin pa //
analyzed: phyi rabs 'dren pa'i gdung 'dzin pa //
translated: The lineage holder who guides future generations,

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sa la gnas //
translated: Resides on the stage of the web of illusion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid las /
translated: From the Secret Suchness of the Body, Speech, and Mind of the Tathagata,

original: mchod yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: mchod yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This is the eighth chapter on the sublime offering water and compassion.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnas par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnas par mdzad do //
translated: Then the Blessed One entered and abided in the samadhi called the Array of Secret Vajra Ornaments.

original: mdzad nas snrel zhi dang bya byed yan man mang po mi 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: mdzad nas snrel zhi dang bya byed yan man mang po mi 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having done so, he entered the samadhi of non-obstruction in the many criss-crosses and activities.

original: de nas yang las la ltos pa rang thad kyi sdug bsngal rnams mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas yang las la ltos pa rang thad kyi sdug bsngal rnams mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do //
translated: Then, for those who depend on karma, he established the immoveable samadhi.

original: de nas yang mu stegs rtag par lta ba ther zug pa la rtag pa ther zug gi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas yang mu stegs rtag par lta ba ther zug pa la rtag pa ther zug gi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
translated: Then, for the tirthikas who have the view of permanence, he tamed them with the attire of permanence.

original: chad pa phyis mi 'dod ces bya ba la cha lugs @17a *//
analyzed: chad pa phyis mi 'dod ces bya ba la cha lugs @17a *//
translated: As for those who say, I do not want annihilation, he tamed them with the attire of permanence.

original: des mnyam pa la 'dzud par mdzad do //
analyzed: des mnyam pa la 'dzud par mdzad do //
translated: By that attire, he brought them to the state of equality.

original: mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bde ba la gnas par mi ster ba rnams la dka' thub 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul dbang chen po mdzad do //
analyzed: mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bde ba la gnas par mi ster ba rnams la dka' thub 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul dbang chen po mdzad do //
translated: Having done that, for those who do not grant the swift and blissful state, he tamed them with the method of the great transformation of austerity.

original: drag shul gyi btsan thabs la dga' ba de thags bzang ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
analyzed: drag shul gyi btsan thabs la dga' ba de thags bzang ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
translated: For those who delight in the harsh and powerful, he tamed them with the attire of Vemacitra.

original: gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
analyzed: gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
translated: For those who are partial and do not have compassion for others, he tamed them with the samadhi of the wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha mi shes pa la 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por mdzad nas 'dul bar mdzad do //
analyzed: gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha mi shes pa la 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por mdzad nas 'dul bar mdzad do //
translated: He subdued those who did not know the difference between virtue and evil in the four continents by becoming a great universal monarch.

original: sbrebs pa chen po dang / gtubs pa chen po dang / btso ba dang / rab tu so tham tham che chung rnams gnyen po dang / zangs kha dang / gshed po chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
analyzed: sbrebs pa chen po dang / gtubs pa chen po dang / btso ba dang / rab tu so tham tham che chung rnams gnyen po dang / zangs kha dang / gshed po chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul bar mdzad do //
translated: He subdued those who were very greedy, very violent, who boiled [others], and who were very hot and cold by becoming an antidote, a copper-colored one, and a great executioner.

original: de dag kyang chos mnyam pa chen po byang chub kyi tshul rdo rje theg pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin gyi tshul gyi gnas pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med de rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas par mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag kyang chos mnyam pa chen po byang chub kyi tshul rdo rje theg pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin gyi tshul gyi gnas pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med de rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas par mdzad do //
translated: They all abide in the inconceivable play of the equality of phenomena, the way of awakening, the supreme of all vajra vehicles, the natural way of abiding, the inseparability of method and wisdom.

original: thabs kyi mdzad pa khro bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi mdzad pa khro bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra called The Wrathful Emanation of Method.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do //
translated: Then the Bhagavān entered the samādhi called “Subjugating Māra” of the great Samantabhadra.

original: de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal @17b pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa blangs pas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa /
analyzed: de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal @17b pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa blangs pas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa /
translated: Then the māra called Great Hatred, who had taken inconceivable suffering for a thousand eons but had not generated the mind of awakening,

original: rab tu gdug pa /
analyzed: rab tu gdug pa /
translated: was extremely vicious,

original: skyi bung ba /
analyzed: skyi bung ba /
translated: terrifying,

original: bong che zhing tshor sang che ba /
analyzed: bong che zhing tshor sang che ba /
translated: with a large body and great strength,

original: mtshon cha dang khrag gi gdug pas sems can la gnod pa /
analyzed: mtshon cha dang khrag gi gdug pas sems can la gnod pa /
translated: harming sentient beings with weapons and blood,

original: mtshon gyi mche ba dang bcas pa /
analyzed: mtshon gyi mche ba dang bcas pa /
translated: with fangs of weapons,

original: dpag tshad nas dri tshor te rab tu gsod gcod za 'thung byed cing me dpung gi dkyil na gdug pa'i 'da' 'phen cing g-yo ba chen pos bsngo ba drag po dang / tsham ngam du gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: dpag tshad nas dri tshor te rab tu gsod gcod za 'thung byed cing me dpung gi dkyil na gdug pa'i 'da' 'phen cing g-yo ba chen pos bsngo ba drag po dang / tsham ngam du gnas par gyur to //
translated: smelling the stench from a league away, killing, cutting, eating, drinking, casting evil spells in the midst of a mass of fire, and remaining with great shaking, fierce dedication, and threatening gestures.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kun tu bzang mo la 'dzum pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kun tu bzang mo la 'dzum pa mdzad do //
translated: Then the Bhagavān, without speaking, smiled at Samantabhadrā.

original: yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las /
analyzed: yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las /
translated: From the cloud of the bodhicitta of the father and mother,

original: aom dhu dhu dhu dhu ra dhu ra dhu ra ho ho /
analyzed: aom dhu dhu dhu dhu ra dhu ra dhu ra ho ho /
translated: om dhū dhū dhū ra dhū ra dhū ra ho ho🔽hum hum hum hrim hrim hrim

original: h'um h'um h'um/ hrim hrim hrim/
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um/ hrim hrim hrim/
translated: ho ho.

original: ho ho zhes brjod pas tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / dbang po'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / pi shnu'i chung ma dang / tsakra'i chung ma dang / de ba'i chung ma dang / ru tra'i chung ma dang / ga ru da'i chung ma dang /
analyzed: ho ho zhes brjod pas tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / dbang po'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / pi shnu'i chung ma dang / tsakra'i chung ma dang / de ba'i chung ma dang / ru tra'i chung ma dang / ga ru da'i chung ma dang /
translated: By saying that, the wives of Brahmā, the wives of Indra, the wives of Viṣṇu, the wives of Śiva, the wives of Cakra, the wives of Deva, the wives of Rudra, the wives of Garuḍa,

original: yul 'khor srung ba'i chung ma dang / rnam thos kyi chung ma dang / 'phags skyes kyi chung ma dang / mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te 'du bar mdzad do //
analyzed: yul 'khor srung ba'i chung ma dang / rnam thos kyi chung ma dang / 'phags skyes kyi chung ma dang / mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te 'du bar mdzad do //
translated: the wives of Dhṛtarāṣṭra, the wives of Virūḍhaka, the wives of Virūpākṣa, and the wives of Kubera, with the perception of intense passion, uncontrollably generated, gathered.

original: de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las;/
analyzed: de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las;/
translated: Moreover, from the cloud of bodhicitta,

original: satva badzra he ru ka /
analyzed: satva badzra he ru ka /
translated: satva vajra heruka

original: mah'a sa ma ya sarba siddhi h'um h'um h'um/
analyzed: mah'a sa ma ya sarba siddhi h'um h'um h'um/
translated: Ho ho ho.

original: ho ho ho zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mang pos mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te bzhugs pa la @18a *//
analyzed: ho ho ho zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mang pos mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te bzhugs pa la @18a *//
translated: By reciting this, the forms of the Tathagatas became adorned with many beautiful features and remained there.

original: tshangs pa'i chung ma la sogs pa 'dus pa thams cad kyis so so re re shin tu chags pa chen po'i yid skyes te 'khril bar gyur to //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i chung ma la sogs pa 'dus pa thams cad kyis so so re re shin tu chags pa chen po'i yid skyes te 'khril bar gyur to //
translated: Then all the assemblies, such as the wives of Brahma, each gave rise to the mind of great passion and embraced.

original: 'khril nas kyang rol pa'i byang chub kyi sems las chu'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten 'khru zhing 'jig par mdzad do //
analyzed: 'khril nas kyang rol pa'i byang chub kyi sems las chu'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten 'khru zhing 'jig par mdzad do //
translated: Having embraced, from the play of bodhicitta, the inconceivable water maṇḍala washed and purified the world.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten rab tu bsreg par mdzad do //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten rab tu bsreg par mdzad do //
translated: Many fire maṇḍalas completely burned the world.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten sems can gtor bar mdzad do //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten sems can gtor bar mdzad do //
translated: Many wind maṇḍalas scattered the sentient beings of the world.

original: de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis rigs nges par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis rigs nges par dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: Then the cloud of bodhicitta conferred empowerment to the definite lineage.

original: de nas gnyis su med pa las bzhengs te /
analyzed: de nas gnyis su med pa las bzhengs te /
translated: Then, arising from nonduality,🔽 the Bhagavān said to the assembly of retinue:🔽  Oh!

original: aom aom sarba bi si du sha shtha dza dza dza zhes brjod pas tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi chung ma la sogs pa gzungs las bran mor dam mnos te slar gnas su phyin par gyur to //
analyzed: aom aom sarba bi si du sha shtha dza dza dza zhes brjod pas tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi chung ma la sogs pa gzungs las bran mor dam mnos te slar gnas su phyin par gyur to //
translated: By reciting Om Om Sarva Vishuddha Sthana Ja Ja Ja, Brahma, Vishnu, and their wives and so forth took an oath of servitude to the spell and returned to their abodes.

original: de nas sku'i cha lugs de las mnyam pa chen po la gnas par mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas sku'i cha lugs de las mnyam pa chen po la gnas par mdzad de /
translated: Then, from that bodily form, he entered into the great equanimity.

original: aom bha ra mu tr'a ma h'a tsanda tsa dur yo gi ni mandal kro dha ha la ha la h'um h'um h'um phat ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma dang / bu sring rdo rje gsod byed ma chen mor gyur te /
analyzed: aom bha ra mu tr'a ma h'a tsanda tsa dur yo gi ni mandal kro dha ha la ha la h'um h'um h'um phat ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma dang / bu sring rdo rje gsod byed ma chen mor gyur te /
translated: By reciting Om Bhara Mura Tarmaha Chandra Tsur Yogini Mandala Krodha Hala Hala Hum Hum Hum Phat, his individual wives and sons became the great Vajra-killing women.

original: bdud gdug pa chen po zhe sdang can la sogs pa la jo bo dam mnos bzhengs zhes smras te /
analyzed: bdud gdug pa chen po zhe sdang can la sogs pa la jo bo dam mnos bzhengs zhes smras te /
translated: They said to the great evil Mara, Arise, take an oath of loyalty to the lord!

original: bdud gdug pa'i lus la khrag gzhibs nas gnas so //
analyzed: bdud gdug pa'i lus la khrag gzhibs nas gnas so //
translated: They drank the blood of the evil Mara's body and remained there.

original: 'on kyang dam nyan par ma btub ste g-yo bag med par shin tu bsngo @18b par gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: 'on kyang dam nyan par ma btub ste g-yo bag med par shin tu bsngo @18b par gnas par gyur to //
translated: However, he was not able to take an oath of loyalty, and he remained in a very angry state.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das sprul pa thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba mdzad de dbug sum phyag drug zhabs bzhi tho ba dang / rdo rje dang / rde'u chung dang / mda' gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo dang / bhandha 'khrug pa'i rol pas kun tu bzang mo dang 'khril nas dbu gsum gsigs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das sprul pa thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba mdzad de dbug sum phyag drug zhabs bzhi tho ba dang / rdo rje dang / rde'u chung dang / mda' gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo dang / bhandha 'khrug pa'i rol pas kun tu bzang mo dang 'khril nas dbu gsum gsigs te /
translated: Then the Bhagavān gathered all the emanations into one, with three faces, six arms, and four legs, holding a hammer, a vajra, a small stone, a bow and arrow, a lasso, a threatening forefinger, and a skull cup in a dancing gesture.🔽He embraced Samantabhadrī and, with three heads, said, “Sarva bhatra sarva bhatra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ.”

original: sarba bha tha sarba bha tha h'um h'um phat phat ces brjod pas zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa rgyal chen phyogs skyong bsdus te /🔽kh'a ha kh'i hi phat phat ru lu ru lu ru lu h'um h'um zhes pas bsgral te bhandhar bkang nas gsol te mi gnas par mdzad do //
analyzed: sarba bha tha sarba bha tha h'um h'um phat phat ces brjod pas zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa rgyal chen phyogs skyong bsdus te / kh'a ha kh'i hi phat phat ru lu ru lu ru lu h'um h'um zhes pas bsgral te bhandhar bkang nas gsol te mi gnas par mdzad do //
translated: With “Kha ha kha hī phaṭ phaṭ rulu rulu rulu hūṃ hūṃ,” he liberated the four māras, Brahmā, Śakra, and so on, the great kings who guard the directions, and placed them in the skull cup.🔽He drank them and made them nonabiding.

original: yang zhabs g-yas pa 'phen cing 'greng sbyor gyi tshul gyis /
analyzed: yang zhabs g-yas pa 'phen cing 'greng sbyor gyi tshul gyis /
translated: Then, with his right leg extended and the left drawn in, he said, “Hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hū

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a dzny'a na garbha ho dhu ho dhu ho dhu /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a dzny'a na garbha ho dhu ho dhu ho dhu /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata mahājñāna garbha ho dhu ho dhu ho dhu.

original: tsanda la bha la ma h'a shr'i he ru ka h'um h'um h'um/
analyzed: tsanda la bha la ma h'a shr'i he ru ka h'um h'um h'um/
translated: Caṇḍa laṃbala mahāśrī heruka hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ.🔽Truṃ truṃ truṃ.🔽Hriṃ hriṃ hriṃ.

original: tr'um tr'um tr'um/ hrim hrim hrim/
analyzed: tr'um tr'um tr'um/ hrim hrim hrim/
translated: Phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ.

original: phat phat phat ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma bu mos rang dbang med par bteg ste phyin to //
analyzed: phat phat phat ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma bu mos rang dbang med par bteg ste phyin to //
translated: By reciting this, each of the wives and daughters were helplessly lifted up and carried away.

original: de nas bdung zhe sdang chen po de yang dregs pa'i chung mas bteg ste phyin to //
analyzed: de nas bdung zhe sdang chen po de yang dregs pa'i chung mas bteg ste phyin to //
translated: Then, the great hatred of the demon was also lifted up by the haughty wife and carried away.

original: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan chen pos /
analyzed: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan chen pos /
translated: After going there, the Bhagavān Śrī Heruka, with the great qualities of body, speech, and mind,

original: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta mah'a sa ma ya shr'i he ru ka dushti dha ka ha na /🔽da ha da ha da ha; pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa /
analyzed: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta mah'a sa ma ya shr'i he ru ka dushti dha ka ha na / da ha da ha da ha; pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata mahāsamaya śrī heruka duṣṭa dāka hana.🔽Dhaha dhaha dhaha.🔽Paca pacaca pacaca.

original: h'a h'a h'a h'a h'a /
analyzed: h'a h'a h'a h'a h'a /
translated: Hā hā hā hā hā.

original: zhes brjod pas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo rnal 'byor ma skul byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma dang / rnal @19a *//🔽'byor ma gtum mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / rdo rje sreg byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo rnams yum gyi gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las thon nas gdug pa'i tshogs bdud mgo nas bzung ste mtshon cha dang phral nas bsgral te lhu sug phral nas bsnams shing bstabs so //
analyzed: zhes brjod pas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo rnal 'byor ma skul byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma dang / rnal @19a *// 'byor ma gtum mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / rdo rje sreg byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo rnams yum gyi gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las thon nas gdug pa'i tshogs bdud mgo nas bzung ste mtshon cha dang phral nas bsgral te lhu sug phral nas bsnams shing bstabs so //
translated: Having said that, the great lord of vajra yoga, the yoginīs Cunda, Ghātinī, Bhakṣaṇā, Caṇḍālī, Mahāsiddhi, Vajradākinī, and Mahāvaśā emerged from the secret space of the mother. They took the head of the demon from the assembly of evil ones, separated him from his weapons, liberated him, separated his limbs, and offered him.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos 'gro ba gnod sbyin bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang / yi dvags kyi lus rta'i lus can gyi srin mo chen mo dang / 'ug pa mo chen mo dang / dur bya chen mo dang /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos 'gro ba gnod sbyin bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang / yi dvags kyi lus rta'i lus can gyi srin mo chen mo dang / 'ug pa mo chen mo dang / dur bya chen mo dang /
translated: Then the blessed one, the glorious great Vajraheruka of great delight, the retinue of the yakṣa demon race, the great rākṣasī with a horse body and a preta body, the great owl, the great vulture, the great jackal, the great dog, the great fox, the great cat, the great pig, the great snake, the great lion, the great tiger, the great leopard, the great bear, the great hyena, the great wolf, the great deer, the great monkey, the great partridge, the great crow, the great owl, the great pigeon, the great cuckoo, the great swan, the great goose, the great peacock, the great parrot, the great mynah bird, the great fish, the great tortoise, the great frog, the great shrimp, the great crocodile, the great shark, the great snake, the great scorpion, the great spider, the great mosquito, the great bee, the great worm, the great ant, the great flea, the great louse, the great human, the great nonhuman, the great male, the great female, the great neuter, the great hermaphrodite, the great one with a human body and the head of a horse, the great one with a human body and the head of an elephant, the great one with a human body and the head of a lion, the great one with a human body and the head of a tiger, the great one with a human body and the head of a leopard, the great one with a human body and the head of a bear, the great one with a human body and the head of a hyena, the great one with a human body and the head of a wolf, the great one with a human body and the head of a deer, the great one with a human body and the head of a monkey, the great one with a human body and the head of a partridge, the great one with a human body and the head of a crow, the great one with a human

original: stag dang / seng+ge dang / ba lang dang / wa dang / khyi dang / pha wang dang / spre'u dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / rnga mo dang / phag la sogs pa ma trang ru tra dang chas te gnas pa la mtshan mar ma chags pa'i sbyor ba mdzad nas /🔽he he he he he /
analyzed: stag dang / seng+ge dang / ba lang dang / wa dang / khyi dang / pha wang dang / spre'u dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / rnga mo dang / phag la sogs pa ma trang ru tra dang chas te gnas pa la mtshan mar ma chags pa'i sbyor ba mdzad nas / he he he he he /
translated: They were in the forms of a tiger, lion, ox, fox, dog, baboon, monkey, crow, vulture, camel, pig, and so on, in the forms of Matram and Rudra.🔽He said, “He he he he he!🔽Hum hum hum hum hum!

original: h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um/
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um/
translated: Phat phat phat!”

original: phat phat phat ces brjod pas byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las seng+ge stabs chen po dang / stag gi cha lugs chen mo dang / myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang /
analyzed: phat phat phat ces brjod pas byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las seng+ge stabs chen po dang / stag gi cha lugs chen mo dang / myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang /
translated: From the cloud of bodhicitta, the great lion posture, the great tiger costume, the great intoxicated horse-headed one, the owl-headed one, the crow, the vulture,

original: mchu ring la sogs pa srin mo'i cha lugs dang ma bral ba'i mdog gis thon nas /
analyzed: mchu ring la sogs pa srin mo'i cha lugs dang ma bral ba'i mdog gis thon nas /
translated: and the long-beaked one emerged in the colors of the rākṣasīs.

original: phat phat phat/ tsanda ma h'a manda la h'um phat zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i tshogs bsgral bar mdzad de bya dang / @19b mche ba can dang / sder chags kyi za stangs kyis 'phrog cing gsol ba mdzad do //
analyzed: phat phat phat/ tsanda ma h'a manda la h'um phat zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i tshogs bsgral bar mdzad de bya dang / @19b mche ba can dang / sder chags kyi za stangs kyis 'phrog cing gsol ba mdzad do //
translated: The assembly of evildoers is liberated by saying phat phat phat, and by saying tsandamahamantala hum phat, he snatches and devours them with the manner of eating of birds, carnivores, and fanged creatures.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mos yang phyis bstan pa la mi sgrib par bya ba'i ched du las kyi bzlas pa 'di bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mos yang phyis bstan pa la mi sgrib par bya ba'i ched du las kyi bzlas pa 'di bka' stsal to //
translated: For the sake of not obscuring the teachings again in the future, the Tathagata Shri Mahamaya also taught this mantra recitation:

original: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru //
analyzed: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru //
translated: In the ten directions of the six worlds,

original: khor yug dur khrod chen po ste //
analyzed: khor yug dur khrod chen po ste //
translated: the great charnel ground of the surrounding iron mountains,

original: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal gyur nas //

original: dgongs nges btsan thabs chen pos myos //
analyzed: dgongs nges btsan thabs chen pos myos //

analyzed: 'dod chags bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis; ;gzugs can bud med lus kun sdud //

original: phrag dog bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis //

analyzed: dbye gsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs //

original: mchod do mchod do stobs chen po //
analyzed: mchod do mchod do stobs chen po //

analyzed: bdag la bdag mchod mnyes pa che; ;khro mo padma'i dkyil 'khor du //

translated: Into the mouth of the Great Blood Drinker.

original: de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag /
analyzed: de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag /
translated: If you do not do it this way, you will be destroyed.

original: mu ka gsod byed bya rog mgo /
analyzed: mu ka gsod byed bya rog mgo /
translated: MUKHA, the killer with a crow’s head,

original: mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can //
analyzed: mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can //
translated: is dark blue and has the posture of an athlete.

original: rdo rje klad 'gems spu gris gcod //
analyzed: rdo rje klad 'gems spu gris gcod //
translated: He brandishes a vajra and cuts with a razor.

original: bhandhar khrag chen gtso la stob //🔽khro gnyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing //
analyzed: bhandhar khrag chen gtso la stob // khro gnyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing //
translated: He offers the great blood into the skull cup to the principal.🔽He has a wrathful brow, wide-open eyes, and a gaping mouth.

original: 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can //
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can //
translated: He has a terrifying, wrathful gaze.
